revised_title: A Tribute to Montague Mattinson Pennell: A Life in the Oil Industry
tldr: Montague Mattinson Pennell had a successful career in the oil industry, working for British Petroleum and the Anglo-Iranian Oil Company. He made significant contributions to the industry and was a respected leader. Pennell was also known for his personal interests, such as classical music, literature, and gardening. He passed away in 1981 at the age of 65, leaving a legacy of dedication and loyalty to his company.
